name: Meepiable.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to the Meepiable page!
This page is created by Meepiable. It is about me so buckle up!

### Who am I?
My name is Zion Chen. I love coding! I started a few months ago when I learned that Minecraft could be fiddled with code. I started with some books, then I eventually ended up here after seeing that coding a website could be fun. The book I am using is *_JavaScript For Dummies_* written by Eva Holland.

### What and where are my projects?
Some of my projects are at [JsFiddle](https://jsfiddle.net). I will be uploading most of them (the ones that work!) to this website.

### Credits
First of all, I would like to say thanks to my father, mother, and sister; they have supported me a lot in this journey. Gracias also to the following: Eva Holland for writing *_JavaScript For Dummies_* and github.com for enabling me to host a website [@Github website](https://github.com). ##THANK YOU!!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
